message.body: Hey if you're interested in talking abt study abroad tm at 6 pm in la Casa, there will be pizza!

Pizza+ informal discussion about Spanish study abroad, targeted to sophomores and juniors (but we need people who've been abroad too). No presentation or anything lol.. Just Donna mancini's pizza conditionality =P
It's at the same time as la Mesa is every week, this weeks just special. We have some posters up and a go boards thing
